description: This file contains utility functions for parsing XML nodes, extracting various data types (uint64, int64, int, string, bool, double) from XML elements and attributes. It appears to be part of an XML handling library within the 'icrule' component.

methods.name: uint64_t icrule_get_xml_uint64(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,uint64_t defvalue)
methods.description: Extracts an unsigned 64-bit integer from an XML node property or content.

methods.name: int64_t icrule_get_xml_int64(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,int64_t defvalue)
methods.description: Extracts a signed 64-bit integer from an XML node property or content.

methods.name: int icrule_get_xml_int(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,int defvalue)
methods.description: Extracts an integer from an XML node property or content.

methods.name: char * icrule_get_xml_string(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,const char * defvalue)
methods.description: Returns a duplicated string from an XML node property or content.

methods.name: bool icrule_get_xml_bool(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,bool defvalue)
methods.description: Returns a boolean value based on the string content (case-insensitive comparison to 'true').

methods.name: double icrule_get_xml_double(xmlNodePtr node,const char * name,double defvalue)
methods.description: Extracts a double-precision floating point number from an XML node property or content.

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_bool
ctags.pattern: /^bool icrule_get_xml_bool(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, bool defvalue)$/

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_double
ctags.pattern: /^double icrule_get_xml_double(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, double defvalue)$/

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_int
ctags.pattern: /^int icrule_get_xml_int(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, int defvalue)$/

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_int64
ctags.pattern: /^int64_t icrule_get_xml_int64(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, int64_t defvalue)$/

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_string
ctags.pattern: /^char* icrule_get_xml_string(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, const char* defvalue)$/

ctags.name: icrule_get_xml_uint64
ctags.pattern: /^uint64_t icrule_get_xml_uint64(xmlNodePtr node, const char* name, uint64_t defvalue)$/
